title: BRIEF-Inventis Confirms Vibe Furniture Entered Call Option To Acquire Workstations
text:
BRIEF-Inventis Confirms Vibe Furniture Entered Call Option To Acquire Workstations

Stock Markets 58 minutes ago (Oct 11, 2019 18:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Inventis Confirms Vibe Furniture Entered Call Option To Acquire Workstations Oct 11 (Reuters) - Inventis Ltd IVT.AX : * CONFIRM VIBE FURNITURE HAS ENTERED INTO A CALL OPTION AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE 100% OF WORKSTATIONS PTY LTD. * ALSO ENTERED INTO EARLY PRELIMINARY DISCUSSIONS WITH OTHER THIRD PARTIES SEEKING TO JOIN GROUP

BRIEF-Inventis Confirms Vibe Furniture Entered Call Option To Acquire Workstations
description: BRIEF-Inventis Confirms Vibe Furniture Entered Call Option To Acquire Workstations
